data.title: Satellite IoT connectivity solutions
data.meta_description: Our technology is a constellation of picosatellites for satellite IoT connectivity and data communication.
data.text:
The use of technology in industrial settings relies on connectivity, which is not possible in enclosed spaces. Industiral plants are usually located in connected areas, but connectivity or power outages may occur.

Our IoT satellite connectivity modem can be integrated into existing local network, providing an independent backup connectivity hardware and sensors.

Advangtages

The continuity of info provision over plants & platforms;

Enforcing ubiquitous control over complex machineries.

The use of technology in glaciers and water infrastructures relies on connectivity, which allows monitoring remote areas, enabling efficient data collection and analysis for scientific research, resource management, and early awarning system.

The IoT satellite modem of our picosatellites can be flexibly integrated into any hardware and sensors.

Usage

Climate change research, facilitating the connection of long-term data on e.g. glacier melting rates, ice thickness and aquifer depletion;

Water resource planning, providing insights into water availability and streamflow patterns;

The assessments of infrastructure stability, including hydroelectric dams, underground pipelines and checking cities pipelines for leaks.

In the realm of smart cities, our hybrid service technology, with the use of gateways, emerges as particularly suitable in addressing urban connectivity challenges and monitoring infrastructure performances (frequency used is originally leveraged for gas metering). This innovative approach offers a multitude of advantages.

Advantages

Signal penetration and obstacle mitigation for uninterrupted communication;

Real-time coverage to address emergencies faster;

Optimize resources ad improve service delivery.

The use of technology in agriculture relies on connectivity which is often lacking in large crop land.

Modems connecting to our picosatellite constellation can be flexibly integrated in any sensorized hardware.

Usage

Retrieval data from a variety of sensors (humidity, temperature, ecc…).

Support Precision Farming applications in remote areas and large crop lands.

Benefits

Being independent from the phone network.

Possibly running on batteries and solar cells.

Robbery is a common issue with container shipping, where goods are found stolen or not corresponding to custom declaration.

Lockers connected with our Iot satellite connectivity solutions prevent these problems.

Usage

They allow logging authorised and unauthorised operations.

They track locations, even on sea.

Benefits

The operation and track record of the container is broadcasted to Apogeo Space’s picosatellites network.

Operation and track recorded data is available to shipping companies supporting management and operations activities.

Enforces ubiquitous control over goods.
